A version of '''Minecraft Indev''' was released on '''February 7, 2010''', announced on [[The Word of Notch|TWoN]] at 10:58 UTC.<ref>[[wordofnotch:375896290|And software sound is now gone]] – The Word of Notch, February 7, 2010</ref>

== Changes ==
=== Blocks ===
'''{{animate|Farmland JE1 BE1.png;Moist Farmland JE1 BE1.png|32px}} [[Farmland]]'''
* Non-full blocks now turn it to [[dirt]].

'''[[File:Glass JE3 BE1.png|32px]] [[Glass]]'''
* Is opaque to light coming through it.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "(06:12:26) <betasword> Notch: Newest update killed glass. Glass no longer lets light through. D:"</ref>
** [[Rain]] no longer goes through glass.

'''[[File:Water JE6.png|32px]] [[Water]]'''
* Non-solid blocks get destroyed by water, although breaking them in this way causes nothing to drop.

=== Gameplay ===
'''[[Music]]'''
* Reimplemented music.
* Is now ambient.
* Starts playing in the spot the player was in and gets quieter when the player moves away from the spot.

== Technical ==
'''General'''
* Sound system is switched to use {{w|OpenAL}}.

== Bugs ==
'''1 bug reported'''
* [[Water]] no longer spreads.<ref>[[#logs|IRC logs]]: "(05:58:30) <Roadcrosser> Notch I cant get water into my farming ground"..."(05:58:40) <Serow> I like farming, I have problems with water acting funny."..."(05:59:05) <Notch> yeah, water's bugged"</ref>
